title: client crashing after login
body: this has been happening for as long as I remember. right after logging in, my client crashes and I have to log in multiple times until I don't crash to actually play. wat do?

replies.body: Are you running on a Mac? Also, do you have any specific error messages that pop up when this happens such as bugsplat or network connection?

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=ynk2kEsA,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-09-28T18:53:01.643+0000)
>
> Are you running on a Mac? Also, do you have any specific error messages that pop up when this happens such as bugsplat or network connection?

no, windows 10. No specific error messages, just that the client has stopped responding.

It sounds like your client is disconnecting from the game platform when this happens. Most of the time, this is a direct result of incompatible network settings causing a drop in your connection. I strongly recommend working through the steps in our [connection troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as a first step in resolving this.

Let me know if those steps caused any change for you.
